title: DPC WATCHDOG VIOLATION
body: I started playing LOL again a few weeks ago. Had no problems until today I started getting  frozen screen few minutes after loading the game. I get DPC WATCHDOG VIOLATION error which is BSOD for windows 8. How can I fix this? I updated graphics driver.

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's possible your graphics drivers are out of date, did you recently upgrade to Windows 8/10?

Please try [updating your graphics drivers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2).
